definitions.definition: An action, job, or task that has been performed very badly; a ruined, defective, or clumsy piece of work.
A patch put on, or a part of a garment patched or mended in a clumsy manner.
A mistake that is very stupid or embarrassing.
A messy , disorderly or confusing combination ; a conglomeration ; hodgepodge .
( archaic ) One who makes a mess of something.

main_definition: An action, job, or task that has been performed very badly; a ruined, defective, or clumsy piece of work.
secondary_definitions: A patch put on, or a part of a garment patched or mended in a clumsy manner.
A mistake that is very stupid or embarrassing.
A messy , disorderly or confusing combination ; a conglomeration ; hodgepodge .
( archaic ) One who makes a mess of something.

definitions.definition: A tumour or other malignant swelling .
A case or outbreak of boils or sores .

main_definition: ( obsolete ) A tumour or other malignant swelling .
secondary_definitions: A case or outbreak of boils or sores .
